page.title: 11A New Family.
page.content:
I am part of a family which has recently moved here. We moved here because of my{dad's job.}I have no brothers or sisters. My dad's job is {personnel manager}for a company which makes robots.
{My dad likes Tibberton}because it is in the country but also near to towns. He chose Tibberton because he liked the area and it is well away from the traffic.
My dad likes Cricket, Squash and reads Naval books, and he also likes gardening.
We have all made{quite a few {friends}and we think that the people of Tibberton are really friendly. My mother shops in{Newport}and enjoys reading.
